Grilled Swordfish


Ingredients
4 (8 ounce) swordfish steaks
Â½ cup teriyaki sauce
2 tablespoons butter, softened
1 teaspoon garlic powder

Cooking Instructions

Gather all ingredients. Preheat an outdoor grill for medium
heat and lightly oil the grate. Meanwhile, marinate
swordfish in teriyaki sauce, 5 minutes per side. Grill
swordfish, basting frequently with melted butter, until fish
flakes easily with a fork, 5 to 6 minutes per side. Season
with garlic powder and serve.
